probate.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the legal process of deciding that someoneâ€™s will has been properly made
probate.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to prove that a will is legal
probate.translation[2].definitions[0].de: the process used to establish that a WILL (=a statement saying who you want to have your money and property when you die) has been properly made out, according to the law
probate.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: All joint-owned property goes to the named beneficiaries without passing through probate.
